name: Easter Bunny
description: A mythical creature associated with the holiday of Easter, who is said to bring Easter eggs to children.

name: Tooth Fairy
description: A mythical creature who is believed to exchange children's lost teeth for small gifts.

name: Rumpelstiltskin
description: A fairy tale character who is known for being able to spin straw into gold.

name: Rapunzel
description: A fairy tale character who is known for her long, golden hair and her confinement in a tower.

name: Snow White
description: A fairy tale character who is known for her beauty and her encounter with seven dwarves.

name: Wicked Witch
description: A character from fairy tales and folklore, often depicted as being wicked and malevolent.

name: Bigfoot
description: A mythical creature that is said to be a large, ape-like creature that roams the forests of North America.

name: Yeti
description: A mythical creature that is said to inhabit the Himalayan region of Nepal and Tibet. It is also known as the Abominable Snowman.

name: Unicorn Joe
description: A mythical creature with the body of a horse and a single spiral horn on its forehead.

name: The Grinch
description: A fictional character created by Dr. Seuss, who is known for trying to steal Christmas.
